alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:24AM AKST until January 29 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulation of 18 to 32 inches. * WHERE...Northeast Prince William Sound, Valdez, Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow in Valdez and Thompson Pass is expected to persist through at least Tuesday morning. Heavy snow may result in up to a foot of accumulation in a 12 hour period Sunday and Monday. Total snow accumulations are expected to be upwards of 36 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
